body: Whats with all the connectivity issues all of the sudden? a lot of people in lobby are marked as X in internet and people cant play games. Did an update go wrong? Please help.
body_tagged: Whats with all the connectivity issues all of the sudden? a lot of people in lobby are marked as X in internet and people cant play games. Did an update go wrong? Please help.
title: Avicus issues

replies.body: Yes, hopefully all of this will be fixed.

replies.body: The server still stands as amazing at it is, regardless of the lag. It may have been because of the large amount of people on today? I'm not too sure. But I'm sure it will be fixed in time. Patience is key :)
